project-settings.name:
Organize project fields into an easy-to-read table
This tool allows users to format data from your project into an easy-to-read table structure. Summarize uses the configuration specified below to determine which fields to include and how to display the data. HTML is generated for each record and each configuration and the html is stored in a project field that is specified in the configuration. The html can then be piped to a descriptive field to be displayed on a project form or can be used to pipe project information into emails or surveys.

The data that can be used in a Summarize table is confined to project fields in the same event. If you would like to display project fields across events or fields from another project, please use the Data Table External Module instead.

sub_settings.name:
Appointment Slot Event
Select the arm/event where each record corresponds to an appointment slot that can be reserved. This event must have the 'Slots' form enabled

Appointment Reservation Event
Select the arm/event where each record corresponds to a reserved appointment slot. This event must have the 'Reservation' form enabled

Survey Complementary Appointment Slot Event
Select the arm/event where each record corresponds to an appointment slot that can be reserved after user complates . This event must have the 'Slots' form enabled

Appointment Reservation Event
Select the arm/event where each record corresponds to a reserved appointment slot. This event must have the 'Reservation' form enabled

Instrument Id for Complementary Appointment
Please select survey instrument that will be followed by an option to schedule an appointment.

Complementary Name
Field will populate name field in the appointment reservation.

Complementary Email
Field will populate Email field in the appointment reservation.

Complementary Mobile
Field will populate Mobile field in the appointment reservation.

Complementary Notes
Field will populate Notes field in the appointment reservation.

Complementary suffix
Fill this if your project contains both regular and complementary appointment. Make sure the suffix same as the one used to copy the instruments..

Title for Appointment
Alternately you can add a title before you pipe in the result

Textarea Label
Label will be displayed above note textarea
